content: 1 yellow - start by chain 7 - row 1 7 single_crochet - row 2 1 decr 3 single_crochet 1 decr 5 single_crochet - row 3 1 decr 1 single_crochet 1 decr 3 single_crochet - row 4 1 decr 1 single_crochet - do a knot leave some yarn attached to sew the triangles together later propeller we re making 2 black triangles sewn together to make the propeller - start by chain 5 - row 1 - 2 5 single_crochet - row 3 1 decr 1 single_crochet 1 decr 3 single_crochet - row 4 3 single_crochet - row 5 1 decr 1 single_crochet - single_crochet all around the shape - slip_stitch knot keep some yarn attached to sew to the other black triangle 12 sewing and stuffing sewing the body - sew the front and back parts of the body and before closing the shape add some stuffing in it until you have a nice oval shape 13 sewing the eyes - sew the black circles in the center of the white circles making the black circles a little bit oval to match bing bong s look adding some stuffing - sew the eyes to the body using white yarn and stuff them before you ve finished sewing 14 sewing the mouth - sew the mouth to the body and add a little bit of stuffing to give it some volume sewing the legs - start by sewing the front and back of the feet and adding some stuffing in them - sew each foot to each leg - stuff the legs and sew them according to pictures 15 sewing the arms - stuff the arms and sew them according to picture 16 sewing the hat - sew the triangles of the hat together following the order of the picture - sew the triangles of the propeller together and on top of the colored triangles - stuff the hat and sew it on top of the body 17 congrats you ve finished the bing bong plush i hope you enjoyed this pattern feel free to tag me if you share your new friend on social media follow me on tiktok instagram and pinterest @entrecrochetshop 18
